channels.name: server-announcements
channels.description: Important updates, events, and changes related to the server

channels.name: introductions
channels.description: Introduce yourself to the manufacturing community! Share your background and interests

channels.name: general-discussion
channels.description: Open discussions about anything related to manufacturing

channels.name: industry-news
channels.description: Latest news, trends, and happenings in the manufacturing industry

channels.name: machining
channels.description: Discussions about machining processes, such as turning, milling, drilling, and grinding

channels.name: forming
channels.description: Share and discuss information about forming processes, like forging, stamping, and bending

channels.name: casting
channels.description: Discussions about casting processes, including sand casting, die casting, and investment casting

channels.name: welding
channels.description: Share and discuss strategies, techniques, and best practices for welding processes

channels.name: additive-manufacturing
channels.description: Discussions about additive manufacturing technologies, such as 3D printing and rapid prototyping

channels.name: assembly
channels.description: Share and discuss information about assembly processes, tools, and strategies

channels.name: lean-manufacturing
channels.description: Discussions about lean manufacturing principles, tools, and implementation strategies

channels.name: six-sigma
channels.description: Share and discuss information about Six Sigma methodologies and projects

channels.name: quality-management
channels.description: Discussions about quality management systems, tools, and best practices

channels.name: supply-chain-management
channels.description: Share and discuss strategies for managing supply chains, logistics, and inventory

channels.name: automation-and-robotics
channels.description: Discussions about automation technologies, robotics, and their applications in manufacturing

channels.name: industry-4.0
channels.description: Share and discuss information about Industry 4.0 technologies, such as IoT, AI, and cloud computing

channels.name: design-for-manufacturing
channels.description: Discussions about design principles and strategies for manufacturability and assembly

channels.name: manufacturing-marketplace
channels.description: Buy, sell, or trade manufacturing equipment, tools, and materials

channels.name: server-feedback
channels.description: Provide feedback and suggestions for improving the Manufacturing Hub server

channels.name: server-rules
channels.description: Review and understand the server rules, guidelines, and code of conduct

channels.name: role-assignments
channels.description: Assign roles to users based on their interests, expertise, or specialization

channels.name: moderator-only
channels.description: Private channel for moderators to discuss server management, moderation, and community issues

channels.name: bot-commands
channels.description: Learn about and use bot commands for server management, moderation, and user engagement
